desc: Let users choose emojis by name/keyword
doc: Let users choose emojis by name/keyword

items.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* toggle - This will toggle the emoji chooser
items.doc:
Binds hotkeys for Emojis

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  * toggle - This will toggle the emoji chooser

Returns:
 * The Emojis object
